author: Cleo Abram
description:
Zero G flights are VERY difficult to pull off, particularly for the pilots. In order to make everyone on the plane feel weightless the pilots need to keep the plane perfectly around you. That means mastering a physics problem that requires three separate pilots. Here’s why. 

Subscribe for more!

#shorts #science #technology #airplane #animation
title: Why This Plane Needs 3 Pilots
